desc.en: Akari is banned from several restaurants offering all-you-can-eat meals due to her reputation as an insatiable glutton. To console her, Sensei takes Akari out for conveyor sushi, but underestimates just how much she can put away.
desc.jp: Akari is banned from several restaurants offering all-you-can-eat meals due to her reputation as an insatiable glutton. To console her, Sensei takes Akari out for conveyor sushi, but underestimates just how much she can put away.
desc.zh_cn: 随着大胃王的名声愈来愈响，{cf亚伽里}被禁止出入无限续吃店。老师见状便请{cf亚伽里}吃回转寿司，但是{cf亚伽里}吃得超乎想像的多，把老师的荷包都榨干了。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Aru and Sensei watch a newly released movie at the theater. Afterwards, they enjoy a lively discussion about it.
desc.jp: Aru and Sensei watch a newly released movie at the theater. Afterwards, they enjoy a lively discussion about it.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}和老师在电影院观看新上映的电影。看完电影后，两人开心地聊着有关电影的内容。

name.zh_cn: 外部经营顾问的入社提议

desc.en: Aru, who decides to buy dinner for Sensei, realizes that she lost her wallet. Aru and Sensei search the streets all night to find it. After getting her wallet back, Sensei finds out that Aru's old wallet is a precious item that members of Problem Solver 68 saved up for to get her as a gift.
desc.jp: Aru, who decides to buy dinner for Sensei, realizes that she lost her wallet. Aru and Sensei search the streets all night to find it. After getting her wallet back, Sensei finds out that Aru's old wallet is a precious item that members of Problem Solver 68 saved up for to get her as a gift.
desc.zh_cn: 说好要请老师吃晚餐却发现自己弄丢钱包的{cf亚瑠}，为了找到钱包，和老师整晚都在路上寻找着。老师好不容易找到了钱包，并得知{cf亚瑠}老旧的钱包是便利屋的大家一起合资送的礼物，也是{cf亚瑠}最珍惜的物品。

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Chihiro takes on a security check request from a boorish boss and discovers suspicious data on their servers. Chihiro is torn between her duty as security manager versus her conscious but decides to blow the whistle on the shady businessperson.
desc.jp: Chihiro takes on a security check request from a boorish boss and discovers suspicious data on their servers. Chihiro is torn between her duty as security manager versus her conscious but decides to blow the whistle on the shady businessperson.
desc.zh_cn: {cf千寻}从一位没礼貌的大老板手中，接下了一项网络安全维护委托。在进行维护的过程中，{cf千寻}在服务器中发现了一份来源不明的数据数据。起初在保密义务和良心之间左右为难的{cf千寻}，最终还是决定揭发委托人的不法行为。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Chinatsu finally has a long-awaited day off. Nothing particularly eventful happens, but the time off feels all the more special because of it.

desc.zh_cn: 和好不容易得到休息日的{cf千夏}共度的一天。一天下来，并没发生特别的事。但正因为这样，这一天对{cf千夏}来说反而是特别的。

desc.en: A girl loses a hairpin and asks Fubuki for help in finding it. Fubuki pretends to be inconvenienced by the request like always, but Sensei catches her secretly looking for the hairpin.
desc.jp: A girl loses a hairpin and asks Fubuki for help in finding it. Fubuki pretends to be inconvenienced by the request like always, but Sensei catches her secretly looking for the hairpin.
desc.zh_cn: 一名少女找上了{cf吹雪}，希望她能帮忙找回自己弄丢的发夹。{cf吹雪}就像平常一样不停嫌麻烦，甚至假装自己不根本不在意此事，然而老师却意外目睹她偷偷四处寻找发夹的模样。

desc.en: Haruna encourages Sensei to try molecular gastronomy. Sensei finds the textures fascinating, but most people find progressive cuisine strange. Then Haruna suggests trying cotton candy, which is a kind of molecular gastronomy that people are familiar with, and her suggestion works successfully.
desc.jp: Haruna encourages Sensei to try molecular gastronomy. Sensei finds the textures fascinating, but most people find progressive cuisine strange. Then Haruna suggests trying cotton candy, which is a kind of molecular gastronomy that people are familiar with, and her suggestion works successfully.
desc.zh_cn: {cf羽留奈}劝说老师试吃分子料理。老师觉得那口感很神奇，但分子料理本身对人们来说还是很陌生。于是，{cf羽留奈}便提议提供人们最熟悉的分子料理——棉花糖，并且这个提案也成功开始运作了。

desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Himari says she acquired a special treasure and presents Sensei with a limited-edition Monster MAX drink. She says she learned an even more delicious way to enjoy the beverage from Veritas and attempts to demonstrate, but the can explodes and Himari ends up soaking wet. Sensei inevitably helps clean Himari up with a towel.
desc.jp: Himari says she acquired a special treasure and presents Sensei with a limited-edition Monster MAX drink. She says she learned an even more delicious way to enjoy the beverage from Veritas and attempts to demonstrate, but the can explodes and Himari ends up soaking wet. Sensei inevitably helps clean Himari up with a towel.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}说自己获得了特殊的宝物，拿出限定版的妖怪MAX饮料给老师看。{cf阳葵}说自己向{cn贝里塔斯}的成员学习了能让这个饮料更美味的方法，于是想进行测试。但罐子却在瞬间爆开，{cf阳葵}被喷了一身湿。老师逼不得已，只好认真用手帕帮{cf阳葵}擦干。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Hina calls upon Sensei for another secret late-night meeting. Sensei points out that the excessive secrecy makes the meetings seem shadier than they really are, which causes Hina to doubt herself.
desc.jp: Hina calls upon Sensei for another secret late-night meeting. Sensei points out that the excessive secrecy makes the meetings seem shadier than they really are, which causes Hina to doubt herself.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳奈}避开他人眼目，再一次在深夜时分把老师叫到偏僻的地方。老师说这样偷偷摸摸地碰面反而显得更可疑，这番话让{cf阳奈}陷入苦恼之中。

name.en: The Girl Still Wants to Read
name.jp: The Girl Still Wants to Read

desc.en: Sensei finds Hiyori stealing electricity from a telephone pole in a lawless district. Hiyori has become pessimistic about her life and explains why she's stealing electricity. To solve her problems, Sensei gives her a portable battery and asks she stop climbing electric poles.
desc.jp: Sensei finds Hiyori stealing electricity from a telephone pole in a lawless district. Hiyori has become pessimistic about her life and explains why she's stealing electricity. To solve her problems, Sensei gives her a portable battery and asks she stop climbing electric poles.
desc.zh_cn: 发现了{cf日和}在无法地带的电线杆上偷电的老师。{cf日和}解释着偷电的经过，同时开始对自己的人生感到悲观。老师把行动电源送给{cf日和}，并叮嘱他以后不要再爬上电线杆了。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.jp: The Girl Still Doesn't Give Up

desc.en: Hoshino buys a book from a bookstore and finds a raffle ticket for entry to an aquarium inside. Though that ticket didn't win, Sensei buys 50 copies of the same book to raise the odds.
desc.jp: Hoshino buys a book from a bookstore and finds a raffle ticket for entry to an aquarium inside. Though that ticket didn't win, Sensei buys 50 copies of the same book to raise the odds.

desc.en: Iroha asks Sensei to go shopping with her for work, but only buys snacks and toys. When Sensei asks why, she confesses that it was her plan to make Sensei take a break. She smiles and says she'll help Sensei with work when they get back to the office.
desc.jp: Iroha asks Sensei to go shopping with her for work, but only buys snacks and toys. When Sensei asks why, she confesses that it was her plan to make Sensei take a break. She smiles and says she'll help Sensei with work when they get back to the office.
desc.zh_cn: {cf伊吕波}向老师提议一起去购物，就当作是工作的一环。但是{cf伊吕波}购买的是零食或玩具之类的物品。当问他这是怎么回事时，{cf伊吕波}乖乖回答道：「这都是为了让老师松一口气才计划的事！」并笑着说回去之后，会帮忙老师的忙。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei follows Misaki up to the rooftop of a high-rise, who is precariously balanced on a ledge. Misaki seems to ignore Sensei's concerns, but she eventually takes an elevator back down with them. On the way, however, it suddenly breaks down and Misaki panics because she has claustrophobia.
desc.jp: Sensei follows Misaki up to the rooftop of a high-rise, who is precariously balanced on a ledge. Misaki seems to ignore Sensei's concerns, but she eventually takes an elevator back down with them. On the way, however, it suddenly breaks down and Misaki panics because she has claustrophobia.
desc.zh_cn: 追着看起来有些危险的{cf美咲}，来到高楼大厦顶楼的老师。但是{cf美咲}对老师的关心没有做出特别的反应，两人搭着电梯回到地面。但是在下来的途中，电梯突然停了下来。在故障的电梯里，{cf美咲}因为有幽闭恐惧症而感到惊慌失措。

desc.en: 美咲聯絡上老師，似乎是有什麼事。然而美咲避而不談，匆匆找了個藉口推辭後就不再說了。
desc.jp: 美咲聯絡上老師，似乎是有什麼事。然而美咲避而不談，匆匆找了個藉口推辭後就不再說了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf美咲}联系上老师，似乎是有什么事。然而{cf美咲}避而不谈，匆匆找了个借口推辞后就不再说了。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 老師在建築外遇到了美咲，但美咲對老師的好意並不領情，還懷疑地詢問老師此行的目的。老師表示自己放心不下美咲，因此過來看看她。美咲表示因為自己要保護大家，所以不能與外人聯絡。儘管如此，美咲還是要老師幫一個忙，老師欣然接受。
desc.jp: 老師在建築外遇到了美咲，但美咲對老師的好意並不領情，還懷疑地詢問老師此行的目的。老師表示自己放心不下美咲，因此過來看看她。美咲表示因為自己要保護大家，所以不能與外人聯絡。儘管如此，美咲還是要老師幫一個忙，老師欣然接受。
desc.zh_cn: 老师在建筑外遇到了{cf美咲}，但{cf美咲}对老师的好意并不领情，还怀疑地询问老师此行的目的。老师表示自己放心不下{cf美咲}，因此过来看看她。{cf美咲}表示因为自己要保护大家，所以不能与外人联络。尽管如此，{cf美咲}还是要老师帮一个忙，老师欣然接受。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 美咲在老師的幫助下來到了大廈頂樓，在那她完成了對GPS定位誤差的修正工作。結束之後，美咲沒說什麼就打算下樓。
desc.jp: 美咲在老師的幫助下來到了大廈頂樓，在那她完成了對GPS定位誤差的修正工作。結束之後，美咲沒說什麼就打算下樓。
desc.zh_cn: {cf美咲}在老师的帮助下来到了大厦顶楼，在那她完成了对GPS定位误差的修正工作。结束之后，{cf美咲}没说什么就打算下楼。

desc.jp: 電梯裡，美咲似乎不是很有精神。她首先自覺是不是自己讓老師感覺不好，然後又表達了對進食的無感——反正，肉體只是一個沒有意義的容器，因為它終將回歸塵土。老師詢問美咲有沒有什麼自覺重要的東西。
desc.zh_cn: 电梯里，{cf美咲}似乎不是很有精神。她首先自觉是不是自己让老师感觉不好，然后又表达了对进食的无感——反正，肉体只是一个没有意义的容器，因为它终将回归尘土。老师询问{cf美咲}有没有什么自觉重要的东西。

desc.jp: 因為過度恐慌，美咲險些暈倒在地。就在這時電源恢復，大門也開了，美咲立刻跑了出去。
desc.zh_cn: 因为过度恐慌，{cf美咲}险些晕倒在地。就在这时电源恢复，大门也开了，{cf美咲}立刻跑了出去。

desc.en: Sensei's computer is wiped due to a sudden power outage, and they realize they have none of their data backed up. Moe saves the day with her excellent computer skills and restores the data. But before Sensei can celebrate, Moe presses an emergency formatting button, and the two are back at square one.
desc.jp: Sensei's computer is wiped due to a sudden power outage, and they realize they have none of their data backed up. Moe saves the day with her excellent computer skills and restores the data. But before Sensei can celebrate, Moe presses an emergency formatting button, and the two are back at square one.
desc.zh_cn: 因为突然短路导致{et夏莱}的数据都搞丢的老师。幸好在行政工作能力杰出的{cf萌}帮助下，快速且成功地复原不见的数据。但是发现「紧急格式化按钮」的{cf萌}忍不住冲动就按下按钮，并让状况回到了原点。

desc.en: Sensei sees Mutsuki while patrolling the streets and ends up following her to the Black Market. Later, when Mutsuki notices Sensei, she reveals her hobby—a collection of various bombs and explosives.

desc.zh_cn: 老师在街上巡逻的时候发现{cf无月}，于是便跟在她背后走进黑市。{cf无月}后来才发现老师。她说想告诉老师自己的兴趣，接着就介绍起各种各样的炸弹。

desc.en: Pina idolizes the world of mobsters. Her behavior seems misguided in a lot of ways, but her own personal code becomes clear upon closer inspection.

desc.zh_cn: 和憧憬任侠的少女{cf菲娜}的相遇。虽然她看起来像是学错了什么，但从中看来，{cf菲娜}所走的路线非常清楚。

desc.en: Sensei goes to the Black Market after receiving a message from Saori. Saori is unable to open a bank account because she needs a reference, so Sensei gladly becomes a guarantor.

desc.en: Saya treats Sensei to a bowl of rich noodles as recompense for her last experiment. Seeing Saya slurp down an entire bowl in the blink of an eye, a Helmet Gang officer asks for her secret to staying slim. Saya offers her some diet medicine, but the side effects knock the office flat on their back.
desc.jp: Saya treats Sensei to a bowl of rich noodles as recompense for her last experiment. Seeing Saya slurp down an entire bowl in the blink of an eye, a Helmet Gang officer asks for her secret to staying slim. Saya offers her some diet medicine, but the side effects knock the office flat on their back.
desc.zh_cn: {cf沙耶}为了答谢老师上次帮忙做实验，招待老师吃油腻腻的面。头盔团干部看到{cf沙耶}若无其事地把油腻食物吃个精光，于是便问她减肥的秘诀。{cf沙耶}把减肥药递给头盔团干部，但由于药具有强烈副作用，头盔团干部吃下肚就晕倒了。

desc.en: Sensei meets Suzumi while on a work visit to Trinity. Suzumi is embarrassed and quickly takes off her headset. However, she recovers when Sensei tells her that they aren't there because someone asked them to be.
desc.jp: Sensei meets Suzumi while on a work visit to Trinity. Suzumi is embarrassed and quickly takes off her headset. However, she recovers when Sensei tells her that they aren't there because someone asked them to be.
desc.zh_cn: 有事前往{sn三一}的老师和{cf铃美}约好一起见面。{cf铃美}慌张地拿下耳机，并且对自己的行为感到很羞愧。但老师安慰说并不是有人指使他这样做的，所以没关系，{cf铃美}也因此获得了慰藉。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei and Utaha meet at the shopping mall to purchase some necessities at her favorite specialty tool shop. There, Utaha exchanges gears and apparatuses while discussing tools and meisters with Sensei.
desc.jp: Sensei and Utaha meet at the shopping mall to purchase some necessities at her favorite specialty tool shop. There, Utaha exchanges gears and apparatuses while discussing tools and meisters with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 前往购物中心购买工具的老师遇见了{cf咏叶}。{cf咏叶}带老师去自己常去的工具专卖店。{cf咏叶}在专卖店更换了工具，并且继续和老师聊工具和巨匠的事。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Wakamo goes to the office to make summer memories for Sensei, who's stuck in the Schale office. Sensei senses that summer events prepared by Wakamo will lead to disaster and suggests to Wakamo some safe things they could do to make great summer memories.
desc.jp: Wakamo goes to the office to make summer memories for Sensei, who's stuck in the Schale office. Sensei senses that summer events prepared by Wakamo will lead to disaster and suggests to Wakamo some safe things they could do to make great summer memories.
desc.zh_cn: 明明夏天到来了，担心着沉浸在烟火大会准备工作中的老师的{cf若藻}，为了制造「完美的夏日回忆」来到了{et夏莱}。然而，告知老师没有自信为其计划出「完美的夏日回忆」的自信，询问老师想做的事并以危险的解释进行实行……。最终，在{et夏莱}一起工作整夜所以没有酿成大祸。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun
name.jp: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun

desc.en: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}学生为了取得能让{cf爱丽丝}使用的枪支,便前往 {sn千年}学园的<{cn工程师部}>。{cf爱丽丝}在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。{cn工程师部}为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了{cn工程师部}。{cn工程师部}的部长{cf咏叶}见状，便害怕起{cf爱丽丝}卓越的身体素质。

desc.en: All of the Game Development Department went to the Engineering Department with Aris.
desc.jp: All of the Game Development Department went to the Engineering Department with Aris.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人带着{cf爱丽丝}去到了{cn工程师部}。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_cn: {cf咏叶}等{cn工程师部}的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。{cf响}主动提出要为{cf爱丽丝}找武器，但{cf爱丽丝}很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。{cf亚都梨}主动为{cf爱丽丝}介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。{cn工程师部}众人本以为{cf爱丽丝}无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，{cn工程师部}决定测试{cn游戏开发部}众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.jp: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}去见{cn研讨会}的部长{cf莉音}。两人在谈论先前{cn游戏开发部}与{cnC&C}发生的事，并且针对{cf爱丽丝}的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于{cf爱丽丝}立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来{cf阳葵}遭到某人的袭击。

desc.en: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.jp: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}与{cf阳葵}秘密会见，开始了对当前情况的梳理。

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}和{cf阳葵}共同策划了{cn游戏开发部}与{cnC&C}的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了{cf爱丽丝}的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，{cf莉音}认为{cf爱丽丝}是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而{cf阳葵}则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

desc.en: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}固守着自己的结论，与{cf莉音}产生了严重分歧。{cf莉音}试图用AMAS将{cf阳葵}困住，但{cf阳葵}轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.jp: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着{cf莉音}的固执。然而这时{cf阳葵}却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位{cnC&C}成员——所牢牢控制住。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.jp: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.zh_cn: 有一天，老师从{cn贝里塔斯}接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往{cn贝里塔斯}部室的途中，老师和{cn游戏开发部}相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，{cf爱丽丝}就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，{cf爱丽丝}也发生了异变。

desc.en: Veritas contacted Sensei directly and said they found a strange stuff. Since no one knew it at Millennium, they asked Sensei to come over and have a look.
desc.jp: Veritas contacted Sensei directly and said they found a strange stuff. Since no one knew it at Millennium, they asked Sensei to come over and have a look.
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}直接联系了老师，说他们找到了一样奇怪的东西。因为问过的人都没见过，所以希望老师来一趟看看。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.
desc.jp: Before the club room, Sensei found the Game Development Department was invited too. The four said they were coming to seek some inspirations, though Yuzu was pretty uncomfortable to get outside. At the club room, Hare showed everyone a strange-looking robot.
desc.zh_cn: 老师到门口时，发现{cn游戏开发部}也受到了邀请。开发部四人表示是为了寻找灵感而来，虽然让一直待在柜子里的{cf柚子}相当不舒服。进去后，{cf晴}向众人展示了一个奇怪的机器人。

desc.en: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.jp: The Veritas explained that the robots were from the outskirts of the Millennium, with a number totaling more than 20. Momoi was grealy surprised at the sight of it. Veritas tried to start it but failed every time - when Aris began reacting to the robot.
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}众人向大家解释，这些机器人来自{sn千年}郊外，且数量超过二十台以上。{cf桃井}等人大受震撼。{cn贝里塔斯}曾尝试使其启动但都以失败告终——就在这时，{cf爱丽丝}突然对这个东西有了反应。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.
desc.jp: The robot, alongside Momoi's game console carrying G.Bible, started operating after interacting with Aris. All panicking, Aris suddenly announced that the "AL-1S" completed the booting, and began attacking everyone.
desc.zh_cn: 与{cf爱丽丝}接触后的机器人开始启动，而众人也发现之前装载着G.Bible的游戏机也一并启动。就在众人不知所措时，{cf爱丽丝}突然宣布“AL-1S”启动完成，并对在场众人发起攻击。
举例/联想：Let me think about it
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: 在外觀如同宇宙戰艦的「生命守護者主艦」上聚集著各個學園的學生。而且Kei警告愛麗絲遠離那艘船。
desc.jp: 在外觀如同宇宙戰艦的「生命守護者主艦」上聚集著各個學園的學生。而且Kei警告愛麗絲遠離那艘船。
desc.zh_cn: 在外观如同宇宙战舰的「生命守护者主舰」上聚集着各个学园的学生。而且Kei警告{cf爱丽丝}远离那艘船。

desc.en: 戰艦上的一切都讓大家感到新奇，一切都像模像樣。琳提到這艘戰艦的規模，認為可能需要大量人手共同協作才能成功，此外對其結構與執行方式尚不清晰。
desc.jp: 戰艦上的一切都讓大家感到新奇，一切都像模像樣。琳提到這艘戰艦的規模，認為可能需要大量人手共同協作才能成功，此外對其結構與執行方式尚不清晰。
desc.zh_cn: 战舰上的一切都让大家感到新奇，一切都像模像样。{cf琳}提到这艘战舰的规模，认为可能需要大量人手共同协作才能成功，此外对其结构与运行方式尚不清晰。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 陽葵提出請求夏萊的幫助，調動一切可能的力量進行支援；她先與貝裡塔斯的千尋取得聯絡，表示之後可能會非常忙碌。
desc.jp: 陽葵提出請求夏萊的幫助，調動一切可能的力量進行支援；她先與貝裡塔斯的千尋取得聯絡，表示之後可能會非常忙碌。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}提出请求{et夏莱}的帮助，调动一切可能的力量进行支援；她先与{cn贝里塔斯}的{cf千寻}取得联系，表示之后可能会非常忙碌。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 工程師部和遊戲開發部登上主艦。工程師部和愛麗絲一見到戰艦就興奮的喊了出來。工程師部已經迫不及待想要對其分析一番，詠葉甚至提到愛麗絲的光之劍終於能被切實地用在宇宙戰艦上了。
desc.jp: 工程師部和遊戲開發部登上主艦。工程師部和愛麗絲一見到戰艦就興奮的喊了出來。工程師部已經迫不及待想要對其分析一番，詠葉甚至提到愛麗絲的光之劍終於能被切實地用在宇宙戰艦上了。
desc.zh_cn: {cn工程师部}和{cn游戏开发部}登上主舰。{cn工程师部}和{cf爱丽丝}一见到战舰就兴奋的喊了出来。{cn工程师部}已经迫不及待想要对其分析一番，{cf咏叶}甚至提到{cf爱丽丝}的光之剑终于能被切实地用在宇宙战舰上了。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 優香對愛麗絲居然跟著上主艦一事感到驚訝，畢竟她可是曾經向她保證會留在千年，不過立刻招致桃井等人的不滿。優香認為千年應該是最安全的，不過乃愛則表示事情可能並不盡然。正說著話，遊戲開發部四人趁機溜走，優香瞬間慌了，而乃愛則淡淡一笑。
desc.jp: 優香對愛麗絲居然跟著上主艦一事感到驚訝，畢竟她可是曾經向她保證會留在千年，不過立刻招致桃井等人的不滿。優香認為千年應該是最安全的，不過乃愛則表示事情可能並不盡然。正說著話，遊戲開發部四人趁機溜走，優香瞬間慌了，而乃愛則淡淡一笑。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}对{cf爱丽丝}居然跟着上主舰一事感到惊讶，毕竟她可是曾经向她保证会留在{sn千年}，不过立刻招致{cf桃井}等人的不满。{cf优香}认为{sn千年}应该是最安全的，不过{cf乃爱}则表示事情可能并不尽然。正说着话，{cn游戏开发部}四人趁机溜走，{cf优香}瞬间慌了，而{cf乃爱}则淡淡一笑。

desc.en: Kei在意識中警告愛麗絲，稱對方不僅身份不明，而且還以某種方法複製了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。這艘船，是遠古人民為了對抗方舟而生的，因而對她是天然的天敵，對她有著生命威脅。她希望愛麗絲能夠聽她的，儘快離開。
desc.jp: Kei在意識中警告愛麗絲，稱對方不僅身份不明，而且還以某種方法複製了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。這艘船，是遠古人民為了對抗方舟而生的，因而對她是天然的天敵，對她有著生命威脅。她希望愛麗絲能夠聽她的，儘快離開。
desc.zh_cn: Kei在意识中警告{cf爱丽丝}，称对方不仅身份不明，而且还以某种方法复制了她“阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”的能力。这艘船，是远古人民为了对抗方舟而生的，因而对她是天然的天敌，对她有着生命威胁。她希望{cf爱丽丝}能够听她的，尽快离开。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.jp: 在工程師部的協助下，得知利用生命守護者主艦就能攻略在天空的阿特拉哈西斯的方舟。攻略阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的作戰計劃書終於完成了。
desc.zh_cn: 在{cn工程师部}的协助下，得知利用生命守护者主舰就能攻略在天空的阿特拉哈西斯的方舟。攻略阿特拉哈西斯的方舟的作战计划书终于完成了。

desc.en: 步前來詢問工程師部的進展如何，但可惜的是連工程師部甚至都不理解這艘戰艦的構造和原理。不過，眾人表示只要明白輸入與輸出的關係就好，根據對應關係即可寫出操作手冊。
desc.jp: 步前來詢問工程師部的進展如何，但可惜的是連工程師部甚至都不理解這艘戰艦的構造和原理。不過，眾人表示只要明白輸入與輸出的關係就好，根據對應關係即可寫出操作手冊。
desc.zh_cn: {cf步}前来询问{cn工程师部}的进展如何，但可惜的是连{cn工程师部}甚至都不理解这艘战舰的构造和原理。不过，众人表示只要明白输入与输出的关系就好，根据对应关系即可写出操作手册。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 更加深入的分析指出，這艘“戰艦”並非所謂宇宙戰艦。其不僅沒有攜帶武器，而且最大飛行高度也僅限於100千米――但更引人矚目的是，這艘船絕大部分都是邏輯運算裝置，換言之這實際上是臺量子電腦。陽葵表示，只要用它就有突破方舟的“多次元詮釋”的可能，而花子認為可能甚至能控制方舟自爆或墜毀。陽葵隨後表示她將負責構建多次元詮釋的內容。
desc.jp: 更加深入的分析指出，這艘“戰艦”並非所謂宇宙戰艦。其不僅沒有攜帶武器，而且最大飛行高度也僅限於100千米――但更引人矚目的是，這艘船絕大部分都是邏輯運算裝置，換言之這實際上是臺量子電腦。陽葵表示，只要用它就有突破方舟的“多次元詮釋”的可能，而花子認為可能甚至能控制方舟自爆或墜毀。陽葵隨後表示她將負責構建多次元詮釋的內容。
desc.zh_cn: 更加深入的分析指出，这艘“战舰”并非所谓宇宙战舰。其不仅没有携带武器，而且最大飞行高度也仅限于100千米――但更引人瞩目的是，这艘船绝大部分都是逻辑运算装置，换言之这实际上是台量子电脑。{cf阳葵}表示，只要用它就有突破方舟的“多次元诠释”的可能，而{cf花子}认为可能甚至能控制方舟自爆或坠毁。{cf阳葵}随后表示她将负责构建多次元诠释的内容。

desc.en: 就在陽葵開始計算時，一個小型AMAS突然來到她身旁，指出她的計算有誤，並建議了一個新方案。陽葵問它的身份，而AMAS則表示它是受會長委託前來支援的計算AI。
desc.jp: 就在陽葵開始計算時，一個小型AMAS突然來到她身旁，指出她的計算有誤，並建議了一個新方案。陽葵問它的身份，而AMAS則表示它是受會長委託前來支援的計算AI。
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf阳葵}开始计算时，一个小型AMAS突然来到她身旁，指出她的计算有误，并建议了一个新方案。{cf阳葵}问它的身份，而AMAS则表示它是受会长委托前来支援的计算AI。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 小機器人提到了愛麗絲，陽葵立刻否認說愛麗絲在別的地方。陽葵喃喃自語，說她絕不會饒恕莉音對季做的一切：將危險的武裝交付給季、禁止她一切的交流、讓她去綁架可愛的後輩。陽葵懷疑季是否明白任務的意義，對莉音所謂“不是生命”的觀點持有異議。她懷疑季在瞭解到事情全貌後的真實感受，並對莉音在事發之後對季不做任何善後直接離開一事憤憤不平。陽葵提到，季曾對她說希望能幫助到大家，陽葵據此推測季現在或許會不要命地在可能出現聖所的地方獨自戰鬥著。她最後評價莉音根本配不上像季這樣一個忠實的C&C女僕。小機器人（實際上就是莉音自己）想繼續協助陽葵進行分析，表示陽葵一定需要她的幫助啟動戰艦；陽葵反駁，如果莉音是瞭解“無名之神”的，那麼她就不會造成那場危機，真正制止危機的並不是她，並讓小機器人離開。
desc.jp: 小機器人提到了愛麗絲，陽葵立刻否認說愛麗絲在別的地方。陽葵喃喃自語，說她絕不會饒恕莉音對季做的一切：將危險的武裝交付給季、禁止她一切的交流、讓她去綁架可愛的後輩。陽葵懷疑季是否明白任務的意義，對莉音所謂“不是生命”的觀點持有異議。她懷疑季在瞭解到事情全貌後的真實感受，並對莉音在事發之後對季不做任何善後直接離開一事憤憤不平。陽葵提到，季曾對她說希望能幫助到大家，陽葵據此推測季現在或許會不要命地在可能出現聖所的地方獨自戰鬥著。她最後評價莉音根本配不上像季這樣一個忠實的C&C女僕。小機器人（實際上就是莉音自己）想繼續協助陽葵進行分析，表示陽葵一定需要她的幫助啟動戰艦；陽葵反駁，如果莉音是瞭解“無名之神”的，那麼她就不會造成那場危機，真正制止危機的並不是她，並讓小機器人離開。
desc.zh_cn: 小机器人提到了{cf爱丽丝}，{cf阳葵}立刻否认说{cf爱丽丝}在别的地方。{cf阳葵}喃喃自语，说她绝不会饶恕{cf莉音}对{cf季}做的一切：将危险的武装交付给{cf季}、禁止她一切的交流、让她去绑架可爱的后辈。{cf阳葵}怀疑{cf季}是否明白任务的意义，对{cf莉音}所谓“不是生命”的观点持有异议。她怀疑{cf季}在了解到事情全貌后的真实感受，并对{cf莉音}在事发之后对{cf季}不做任何善后直接离开一事愤愤不平。{cf阳葵}提到，{cf季}曾对她说希望能帮助到大家，{cf阳葵}据此推测{cf季}现在或许会不要命地在可能出现圣所的地方独自战斗着。她最后评价{cf莉音}根本配不上像{cf季}这样一个忠实的{cnC&C}女仆。小机器人（实际上就是{cf莉音}自己）想继续协助{cf阳葵}进行分析，表示{cf阳葵}一定需要她的帮助启动战舰；{cf阳葵}反驳，如果{cf莉音}是了解“无名之神”的，那么她就不会造成那场危机，真正制止危机的并不是她，并让小机器人离开。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 花子回來，聽到了陽葵跟會長的對話。她說這段對話讓她想起來一個諷刺寓言故事：一個試圖躲避預言的國王，不惜一切代價試圖規避它，結果反而造成了王國的毀滅。陽葵思考所謂命運和決定論是否有意義。
desc.jp: 花子回來，聽到了陽葵跟會長的對話。她說這段對話讓她想起來一個諷刺寓言故事：一個試圖躲避預言的國王，不惜一切代價試圖規避它，結果反而造成了王國的毀滅。陽葵思考所謂命運和決定論是否有意義。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}回来，听到了{cf阳葵}跟会长的对话。她说这段对话让她想起来一个讽刺寓言故事：一个试图躲避预言的国王，不惜一切代价试图规避它，结果反而造成了王国的毁灭。{cf阳葵}思考所谓命运和决定论是否有意义。

desc.en: 聖亞從結果論的角度分析，王的最大錯誤就是他身為“王”這件事――如果他不是王，就看不見神諭，就不會有危機；但同時也指出這樣的故事是沒有答案的。
desc.jp: 聖亞從結果論的角度分析，王的最大錯誤就是他身為“王”這件事――如果他不是王，就看不見神諭，就不會有危機；但同時也指出這樣的故事是沒有答案的。
desc.zh_cn: {cf圣亚}从结果论的角度分析，王的最大错误就是他身为“王”这件事――如果他不是王，就看不见神谕，就不会有危机；但同时也指出这样的故事是没有答案的。

desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 琳和老師無意間聽到了花子與陽葵的對話，表示會將會長在船上一事保密。琳表示這讓她想起了七之古則，一些聯邦學生會會長很喜歡的東西。琳向老師講出了第二項古則的內容：透過無法理解的事物，我們是否能夠理解呢？花子對此感到新奇，而琳則指出這個句子並不完整，更像個問題――不過會長忽略了這點，表示只要將其中的要素替換成自己想要的東西就好了。
desc.jp: 琳和老師無意間聽到了花子與陽葵的對話，表示會將會長在船上一事保密。琳表示這讓她想起了七之古則，一些聯邦學生會會長很喜歡的東西。琳向老師講出了第二項古則的內容：透過無法理解的事物，我們是否能夠理解呢？花子對此感到新奇，而琳則指出這個句子並不完整，更像個問題――不過會長忽略了這點，表示只要將其中的要素替換成自己想要的東西就好了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}和老师无意间听到了{cf花子}与{cf阳葵}的对话，表示会将会长在船上一事保密。{cf琳}表示这让她想起了七之古则，一些联邦学生会会长很喜欢的东西。{cf琳}向老师讲出了第二项古则的内容：通过无法理解的事物，我们是否能够理解呢？{cf花子}对此感到新奇，而{cf琳}则指出这个句子并不完整，更像个问题――不过会长忽略了这点，表示只要将其中的要素替换成自己想要的东西就好了。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

name.jp: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟佔領戰
name.zh_cn: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战

desc.en: 成功擊退包圍船的敵人後，白子隨著爆炸出現在老師的面前。同一時間，對策委員會的所有人都出現在白子的面前，白子有些驚訝且立刻逃走了。在防禦生命守護者主艦的同時，也展開了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的佔領戰。
desc.jp: 成功擊退包圍船的敵人後，白子隨著爆炸出現在老師的面前。同一時間，對策委員會的所有人都出現在白子的面前，白子有些驚訝且立刻逃走了。在防禦生命守護者主艦的同時，也展開了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的佔領戰。
desc.zh_cn: 成功击退包围船的敌人后，{cf白子}随着爆炸出现在老师的面前。同一时间，{cn对策委员会}的所有人都出现在{cf白子}的面前，{cf白子}有些惊讶且立刻逃走了。在防御生命守护者主舰的同时，也展开了阿特拉哈西斯方舟的占领战。

desc.en: 戰鬥非常成功，但就在眾人以為一切結束時，爆炸突然發生在船艦內。
desc.jp: 戰鬥非常成功，但就在眾人以為一切結束時，爆炸突然發生在船艦內。
desc.zh_cn: 战斗非常成功，但就在众人以为一切结束时，爆炸突然发生在船舰内。

desc.en: 另一位白子對老師居然能到達這裡感到驚奇，但同時也警告老師。綾音大聲叫喊，讓對策委員會一行人前來抓住白子，但白子見狀後以手榴彈為掩護，立刻跑掉了。
desc.jp: 另一位白子對老師居然能到達這裡感到驚奇，但同時也警告老師。綾音大聲叫喊，讓對策委員會一行人前來抓住白子，但白子見狀後以手榴彈為掩護，立刻跑掉了。
desc.zh_cn: 另一位{cf白子}对老师居然能到达这里感到惊奇，但同时也警告老师。{cf绫音}大声叫喊，让{cn对策委员会}一行人前来抓住{cf白子}，但{cf白子}见状后以手榴弹为掩护，立刻跑掉了。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: 莉音敏銳地感覺出另一位白子的實時位置跳躍似乎是依靠方舟強大的計算能力所實現，因而只要保住它的計算能力，製作出一個空間跳躍程式並不是問題。她繼而指出，這樣就能讓所有人安全回到地面。
desc.jp: 莉音敏銳地感覺出另一位白子的實時位置跳躍似乎是依靠方舟強大的計算能力所實現，因而只要保住它的計算能力，製作出一個空間跳躍程式並不是問題。她繼而指出，這樣就能讓所有人安全回到地面。
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}敏锐地感觉出另一位{cf白子}的实时位置跳跃似乎是依靠方舟强大的计算能力所实现，因而只要保住它的计算能力，制作出一个空间跳跃程序并不是问题。她继而指出，这样就能让所有人安全回到地面。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 陽葵讀出了莉音的意思：她自己似乎也無法修復這艘船。陽葵表示莉音這種心態就像之前提到過的那位國王一般，因他自己對他人的不信任而引發了諸多問題。莉音表示同意，但同時說這點恐怕很難改變；陽葵則澄清她只是純粹討厭，並非鄙視。
desc.jp: 陽葵讀出了莉音的意思：她自己似乎也無法修復這艘船。陽葵表示莉音這種心態就像之前提到過的那位國王一般，因他自己對他人的不信任而引發了諸多問題。莉音表示同意，但同時說這點恐怕很難改變；陽葵則澄清她只是純粹討厭，並非鄙視。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}读出了{cf莉音}的意思：她自己似乎也无法修复这艘船。{cf阳葵}表示{cf莉音}这种心态就像之前提到过的那位国王一般，因他自己对他人的不信任而引发了诸多问题。{cf莉音}表示同意，但同时说这点恐怕很难改变；{cf阳葵}则澄清她只是纯粹讨厌，并非鄙视。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Eimi and Sensei launch an investigation of the area where Decagrammaton's signal was captured. Contrary to Himari's prediction, it fails to yield any results. But after a moment of contemplation, Sensei notices the presence of a highly conspicuous vending machine and they are met with Decagrammaton's main form.
desc.jp: Eimi and Sensei launch an investigation of the area where Decagrammaton's signal was captured. Contrary to Himari's prediction, it fails to yield any results. But after a moment of contemplation, Sensei notices the presence of a highly conspicuous vending machine and they are met with Decagrammaton's main form.
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}和老师调查了捕捉到十字神名信号的地方。探索后没有获得任何成果，和{cf阳葵}预料中的完全不一样。但经过调查后，老师留意到了充满违和感的贩卖机，并从中发现了十字神名的本体。

desc.jp: Problem Solver meets with Sensei at the New Year's event and they head inside the venue to make their wishes. The Kaitengers attack just as they're all standing before the offering box.
desc.zh_cn: 在寻找新春活动会场时，便利屋的成员碰巧发现了老师，于是老师便从善如流地加入了她们的行列，和她们一起走进会场内许愿。就在大家并肩站在赛钱箱前许愿时，凯坦泽朝他们发动了突袭。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.zh_cn: {sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}学园的交流会开幕了。为了以防万一，因为{cn阴阳部}部长仁耶说希望可以帮助那个交流会的话，老师提出认定{cn忍术研究部}为正式社团当成条件，决定和{cf三千留}、{cf月夜}、{cf伊树菜}一起帮助交流会。

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: Ayane summons everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force to show off a helicopter she purchased. Serika bursts into the meeting late, shouting that she won first place in a raffle.
desc.jp: Ayane summons everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force to show off a helicopter she purchased. Serika bursts into the meeting late, shouting that she won first place in a raffle.
desc.zh_cn: 某天，{cf绫音}召集了{cn对策委员会}的成员，并宣布有「重大告知」。在告诉大家自己用每个月一点一滴存下来的钱买了一架直升机的同时，在宾果大会抽中头奖的{cf茜香}兴冲冲地冲了进来……

name.en: Life Is Full of So Many Surprises Part 1
name.jp: Life Is Full of So Many Surprises Part 1

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?

name.en: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1
name.jp: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1

desc.en: Believing Sensei was kidnapped, Wakamo is motivated. She drives out Rabu, who could be a threat to Sensei, and takes over the Helmet Gangsters. She ends up leading the Helmet Gangsters and once again challenges the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: Believing Sensei was kidnapped, Wakamo is motivated. She drives out Rabu, who could be a threat to Sensei, and takes over the Helmet Gangsters. She ends up leading the Helmet Gangsters and once again challenges the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: 知道老师也在这个渡假胜地的{cf若藻}，误以为老师被坏人给抓走，便和良舞与头盔团一起发起进攻。{cf绫音}虽然试图和平解决，{cf若藻}却不由分说地发动了总攻击。

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.zh_cn: 面对最后之战前，和{sn阿拜多斯}成员召开作战会议的{cf静子}们。听说了头盔团和凯萨PMC有关联的事实。于喵天丸也向凯萨PMC雇用了兵力感觉到，在这前方等待着的，并不是单纯的头盔团同时，一行人坚定了前往最后之战的决意。

name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: Kazusa and Sensei go where the thugs are in search of Reisa. There, they join the After-School Sweets Gang, and rush in to save Reisa.
desc.jp: Kazusa and Sensei go where the thugs are in search of Reisa. There, they join the After-School Sweets Gang, and rush in to save Reisa.
desc.zh_cn: {cf千纱}和老师为了寻找{cf澪纱}而到了太妹们所在的地方。老师找来的放学后的甜点团也在那里会合，一起冲进去救出{cf澪纱}。

name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

desc.en: Noa and Sensei return to the industrial lab to take a look at the newly built cheer bot. But when they arrive, they are greeted by the members of the Engineering Department wearing cheerleading uniforms instead. They confess that they had finished the cheer bot, but it went haywire and fled the scene when they tried running tests. However, Noa reviews the robot's blueprints and determines it must have been hacked.
desc.jp: Noa and Sensei return to the industrial lab to take a look at the newly built cheer bot. But when they arrive, they are greeted by the members of the Engineering Department wearing cheerleading uniforms instead. They confess that they had finished the cheer bot, but it went haywire and fled the scene when they tried running tests. However, Noa reviews the robot's blueprints and determines it must have been hacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf乃爱}和老师回到工业实习室查看新制作的应援机器人。但在那里等他们的却是一身应援团打扮的{cn工程师部}。原来，虽然成功做出了应援机器人，但它却突然失控逃走了。{cf乃爱}看了应援机器人的蓝图，怀疑是被人入侵了。

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.zh_cn: {cn美食研究会}在麻雀亭用餐，老板娘表示餐厅即将要结束营业了。用完餐后，{cn美食研究会}表示不忍心麻雀亭就这样消失，{cf羽留奈}说自己知道有谁能帮忙。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

desc.en: Fuuka gets to work assessing the Sparrow's state and calls on the Chirp Supermarket for help. Unfortunately, the Gourmet Helmet Gang overhears this. Fuuka returns to Sparrow to cook with the Restaurateur and asks Haruna to evaluate the results. They're interrupted by a raid from the Gourmet Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Fuuka gets to work assessing the Sparrow's state and calls on the Chirp Supermarket for help. Unfortunately, the Gourmet Helmet Gang overhears this. Fuuka returns to Sparrow to cook with the Restaurateur and asks Haruna to evaluate the results. They're interrupted by a raid from the Gourmet Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_cn: {cf风华}为了查看麻雀亭的状况和解决问题，于是便向小哔超市寻求协助，但饕餮头盔团目睹了此一情况。回到麻雀亭的{cf风华}和老板娘一起制作食物，然后请{cf羽留奈}进行试吃评估。就在这个时候，饕餮头盔团闯入了麻雀亭。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

desc.en: Nyaomoto Kan, the president of the Nyao Foods chain of restaurants, contemplates how to deal with Sparrow. Meanwhile, the Sparrow's Restaurateur is scared to fight such a large corporation. Faced with an ongoing series of misfortunes, they want to give up. But Juri persuades them to keep trying.
desc.jp: Nyaomoto Kan, the president of the Nyao Foods chain of restaurants, contemplates how to deal with Sparrow. Meanwhile, the Sparrow's Restaurateur is scared to fight such a large corporation. Faced with an ongoing series of misfortunes, they want to give up. But Juri persuades them to keep trying.
desc.zh_cn: 连锁公司喵食品公司的会长喵．元宽在苦思麻雀亭的待遇问题。另一方面，经过一连串的骚动，麻雀亭的老板娘因害怕对抗大企业，一度想要放弃。但{cf茱莉}说服老板娘绝对不能放弃。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?

desc.en: Sensei just barely contains the conflict between the RABBIT Squad members and the Yatoura villagers, and the members come to realize that they had misunderstood the villagers due to their own prejudices and fear.
desc.jp: Sensei just barely contains the conflict between the RABBIT Squad members and the Yatoura villagers, and the members come to realize that they had misunderstood the villagers due to their own prejudices and fear.
desc.zh_cn: 在老师的介入之下，{cnRABBIT小队}成员们和夜户浦村村民们间的交战才勉强打住。小队成员们后知后觉地发现，自己因为偏见和恐惧而对村民们有所误解。

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

desc.en: The next day, the fisherman discovers a mysterious ship near the Demon's Reef. While the villagers are frightened, believing the ship to be the legendary "Ghost Ship," RABBIT Squad quickly notices something suspicious about it.
desc.jp: The next day, the fisherman discovers a mysterious ship near the Demon's Reef. While the villagers are frightened, believing the ship to be the legendary "Ghost Ship," RABBIT Squad quickly notices something suspicious about it.
desc.zh_cn: 次日，钓客在鬼怪暗礁附近发现不可思议的船舶。虽然村民们认为那艘船是传说中的「老式船只」因而感到害怕，但{cnRABBIT小队}成员们立刻就察觉到吊诡之处。

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!

name.jp: A Day with the Knowledge Liberation Front

desc.en: While cleaning the Red Winter Library, Meru and Momiji discover Luna, a modern literary masterpiece. But what makes it a masterpiece? Meru and Momiji can't see eye-to-eye, and this schism leads to the ruin of the Knowledge Liberation Front!
desc.jp: While cleaning the Red Winter Library, Meru and Momiji discover Luna, a modern literary masterpiece. But what makes it a masterpiece? Meru and Momiji can't see eye-to-eye, and this schism leads to the ruin of the Knowledge Liberation Front!
desc.zh_cn: 爱瑠和{cf红叶}在{sn赤冬}图书馆的大扫除过程中发现了曾经风靡一时的名作《LUNA》。不过两人对于名作有着截然不同的见解，这成了导致{cn知识解放战线}破局的催化剂。

name.en: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure
name.jp: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure
name.zh_cn: 漫画同人物语～2人所追求的最终回～

desc.en: The unfinished masterpiece, Luna, brought the Knowledge Liberation Front to ruin. In order to reconcile with Momiji and reunite the Knowledge Liberation Front, Meru must complete the unfinished Luna... What kind of ending lies ahead?!
desc.jp: The unfinished masterpiece, Luna, brought the Knowledge Liberation Front to ruin. In order to reconcile with Momiji and reunite the Knowledge Liberation Front, Meru must complete the unfinished Luna... What kind of ending lies ahead?!
desc.zh_cn:
将{cn知识解放战线}推向崩溃的悲剧名作《LUNA》。为了与{cf红叶}和解，也为了{cn知识解放战线}的重新团结，爱瑠打算完成未完的《LUNA》……
究竟在同人之路的前方等待着的会是什么样的结局呢！？

name.en: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure
name.jp: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure

desc.en: The unfinished masterpiece, Luna, brought the Knowledge Liberation Front to ruin. In order to reconcile with Momiji and reunite the Knowledge Liberation Front, Meru must complete the unfinished Luna... What kind of ending lies ahead?!

究竟在同人之路的前方等待着的会是什么样的结局呢！？

desc.en: After an argument with Momiji, Meru asks Sensei for advice. She resolves to find the legendary final volume of Luna to offer as an olive branch to Momiji.
desc.jp: After an argument with Momiji, Meru asks Sensei for advice. She resolves to find the legendary final volume of Luna to offer as an olive branch to Momiji.
desc.zh_cn: 和{cf红叶}大吵一架后，爱瑠向老师请求咨询。在一番深思过后，爱瑠开始寻找传说中的《LUNA》最终卷，想当作道歉礼物送给{cf红叶}。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.jp:

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
